com.esri.svr.ejb
Class MapServiceIBean

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.svr.ejb.MapServiceIBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, Serializable, javax.ejb.SessionBean
public class MapServiceIBean
extends Object
implements javax.ejb.SessionBean

This class provides implementation of MapServiceI and MapServiceIHome interfaces in addition to SessionBean interface.

See Also:
